Today I am going to show you How you get input value using the v-modal with form group component using BootstrapVue in VueJS?

Table of contains

  • Setup the Vue.js
  • Install the Bootstrap and BootstrapVue
  • Create FirstComponent.vue and import it into App.js
  • Get input value using the v-modal

Let‚Äôs start today‚Äôs tutorial How do I get input value using the v-modal with form group component using BootstrapVue in VueJS?

Setup the Vue.js

First, we have to install the Vue project, I had installed the vueJS in my system. If you haven‚Äôt installed or have any problem with installation you can follow this article, which will show you step by step process of installation.

Install the Bootstrap and BootstrapVue

First, we have to install the Vue project, I had installed the vueJS in my system. If you haven‚Äôt installed or have any problem with installation you can follow this article, which will show you step by step process of installation. How to install or configure vue-bootstrap in VueJS?

Create FirstComponent.vue and import it into App.js

Create the new component in the src/components/ components folder. the component name is FirstComponent.vue and imported into the App.js file:

App.js

<template>
  <div id="app">
    <FirstComponent />
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import FirstComponent from "./components/FirstComponent.vue";
export default {
  name: "App",
  components: {
    FirstComponent,
  },
};
</script>

Get input value using the v-modal

Using the <b-form-group> component we are adding some structure to the form. Its purpose is to add the form control with a label and to provide help text and invalid/valid feedback text, as well as visual (color) contextual state feedback.

we are going to get the value of form input using the v-modal v-model="sitename" in BootstrapVue.And save the input value into sitename Let‚Äôs see the code example:

FirstComponent.js

<template>
  <b-container fluid>
    <b-row>
      <b-col md="6" offset-md="3">
        <h1>Welcome to sortoutcode.com</h1>
        <b-form-group label="Enter your name">
          <b-form-input v-model="sitename"></b-form-input>
        </b-form-group>
        <div class="m-5">
          <pre>{{sitename}}</pre>
        </div>
      </b-col>
    </b-row>
  </b-container>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: "FirstComponent",
  data() {
    return {
      sitename: '',
    }
  },
};
</script>
